    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schutzimpfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vaccinazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμβολιασμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vacunación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Vaccinations are now considered a part of everyday life, but how do they work? This unit will help those with a background in biology understand the historical development of vaccination, assess the various types of vaccines used today, examine their production and explore the limitations that are placed on vaccination programmes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Antibodies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Antigen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Immunisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Immunogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Infectious_disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Mutation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Polio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Smallpox</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vaccination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vaccines</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schutzimpfungen gelten jetzt als ein Teil 
tägliche Lebensdauer, aber wie sie arbeiten? Diese Maßeinheit 
hilft denen mit einem Hintergrund in der Biologie, die historische 
Entwicklung der Schutzimpfung zu verstehen, die verschiedenen Typen 
der Impfstoffe festzusetzen, die heute, ihre Produktion zu 
überprüfen und die Beschränkungen zu erforschen benutzt werden, die
auf Schutzimpfungprogramme plaziert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que vaccinations une partie de vie 
quotidienne, mais comment elles sont-elles maintenant considérées 
travaillent ? Cette unité aidera ceux avec un fond dans la 
biologie pour comprendre le développement historique de la 
vaccination, pour évaluer les divers types de vaccins utilisés 
aujourd'hui, pour examiner leur production et pour explorer les 
limitations qui sont placées sur des programmes de vaccination.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vaccinations é considerada agora uma parte da 
vida diária, mas como elas trabalha? Esta unidade ajudará 
àquelas com um fundo na biologia compreender o desenvolvimento 
histórico do vaccination, avaliar os vários tipos de vacinas usadas 
hoje, examinar sua produção e explorar as limitações que são 
colocadas em programas do vaccination.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le vaccinazioni ora è considerata una parte di 
vita di tutti i giorni, ma come funziona? Questa unità aiuterà
quelle con una priorità bassa nella biologia per capire lo sviluppo 
storico della vaccinazione, per valutare i vari tipi di vaccini usati 
oggi, per esaminare la loro produzione e per esplorare le limitazioni 
che sono disposte sui programmi di vaccinazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εμβολιασμοί θεωρούνται τώρα μέρος της καθημερινής 
ζωής, αλλά πώς λειτουργούν; Αυτή η μονάδα θα βοηθήσει 
εκείνους με ένα υπόβαθρο στη βιολογία να καταλάβουν την ιστορική
ανάπτυξη του εμβολιασμού, να αξιολογήσουν τους διάφορους τύπους 
εμβολίων χρησιμοποιούμενων σήμερα, να εξετάσουν την παραγωγή τους
και να ερευνήσουν τους περιορισμούς που τοποθετούνται στα 
προγράμματα εμβολιασμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Las vacunaciones ahora se considera una parte de
vida diaria, pero cómo ellos trabaja? Esta unidad ayudará a 
ésos con un fondo en biología para entender el desarrollo histórico
de la vacunación, para evaluar los varios tipos de vacunas usadas 
hoy, para examinar su producción y para explorar las limitaciones que
se ponen en programas de la vacunación.</string>
          </description>
